appium.serverDefaults.configFile.markdownDescription: Explicit path to Appium config file

appium.serverDefaults.useBundledAppium.markdownDescription: Use bundled Appium. If `false`, look for a locally installed Appium or a globally installed Appium
appium.serverDefaults.useBundledAppium._description: Use bundled Appium. If "false", look for a locally installed Appium or a globally installed Appium

appium.serverDefaults.executablePath.markdownDescription: Explicit path to Appium executable. If left blank, the extension will search for one or fall back to the bundled Appium.  Overrides `#appium.serverDefaults.useBundledAppium#`
appium.serverDefaults.executablePath._description: Explicit path to Appium executable. If left blank, the extension will search for one or fall back to the bundled Appium.  Overrides "appium.serverDefaults.useBundledAppium"

appium.sessionDefaults.remoteAppiumVersi.markdownDescription: Version of Appium server. Ignored when using bundled Appium.

appium.sessionDefaults.protocol.markdownDescription: Protocol to use when attaching to an Appium server

appium.sessionDefaults.pathname.markdownDescription: Override base pathname of Appium server; defaults to path depending on value of `#appium.sessionDefaults.remoteAppiumVersion#`
appium.sessionDefaults.pathname._description: Override base pathname of Appium server; defaults to path depending on value of "remoteAppiumVersion"

appium.sessionDefaults.refresh.markdownDescription: Interval at which to poll known servers for status (in milliseconds)
